sentence.idiomatic: This company offers all kinds of consultation services on studying abroad.
Excuse me Miss, do you offer visa consultation services here?
Sorry, we don’t offer legal consultation here.
Xiao Wang is applying for a travel visa to Australia.
He didn’t get the full scholarship he had applied for.
Why didn’t you apply to be the class monitor?
Have you completed all the procedures?
I haven’t completed the procedures for going abroad.
To enter a country, you need to complete the customs and immigration procedures.
Please attach a return envelope when you send the form.
Did you attach your photo to your application form?
I have enclosed two movie tickets with the letter. I hope you'll enjoy it!
How do I submit the application form for going abroad?
Only Xiao Zhang didn’t hand in his homework on time.
Mr. Wang submitted his passport to the embassy just now.
Sorry, I can’t accept your invitation.
Did you accept his apology?
We only accept payment by credit card.
Hello, this is the visa inquiry service at the Chinese consulate in New York. How can I help you?
I want to apply for a visa to China. What is the procedure?

First of all, you need to fill in an application form and attach a passport photo. Sign the form and pay the application fee. You may download the form from the internet or pick it up from the embassy. When you finish the form, you may submit it by post or in person.
How much is the application fee? How do I pay?
It's 50 dollars. You can pay by credit card, debit card, or personal check. We do not accept cash payments.
When can I pick up the visa?
It takes 2 weeks. We will inform you by post or email when the visa is ready for pick-up. Do you know our address?
Yes, I do. Thank you for your help.
You're welcome. Bye.
